longBusinessSummary: Perpetual Energy Inc. engages in the exploration, production, and marketing of oil and natural gas in Canada. The company's portfolio of assets includes liquids-rich natural gas assets located in deep basin of west central Alberta; heavy crude oil and shallow conventional natural gas assets in Eastern Alberta; and undeveloped bitumen leases located in Northern Alberta. Perpetual Energy Inc. is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
